function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Constantly changing policies between private and public measures","Impact":"Confusion and inconsistency in compliance and behavior","Mitigation":"Consistent communication and coordination between private and public sectors","Technologies":"Communication tools for public announcements and updates","People":"General public, businesses, policymakers","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Modeling assumptions for interventions (e.g., lockdowns) with a 7-day delay in implementation","Impact":"Potential delay in effective action against transmission","Mitigation":"Regular review and update of modeling assumptions based on new data and research","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for real-time monitoring and modeling","People":"Research and modeling teams, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Stable compliance with a package of 'barrier gestures' compared to individual components","Impact":"Inconsistent adoption of specific preventive measures","Mitigation":"Promotion of holistic approach to public health measures through education and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Public health communication platforms, social media outreach","People":"General public, health organizations, community leaders","Owner":"Public health agencies, community organizations"}]}
